column2: "The Hunter's role in a party is to be like a brick wall up front. But you already know that, don't you?"
"That's why we Hunters have to know exactly what the other party members are up to at all times."
"And nothing is better for widening your perspective than experience. Even I have room for improvement, if you can believe that."
"So what say you join me on the Tundra to practice a little teamwork?"
